notes.speech-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
INTRODUCTION: characteristics of a successful person
FIRST CHARACTERISTIC: tenacity
means never giving up, never taking "no" for an answer
example = Abraham Lincoln
SECOND CHARACTERISTIC: luck
is not under person's control
example = inventing right thing at right time
saying = better to be lucky than rich
CONCLUSION: tenacity and luck are characteristics of successful person

check-list.item-text: I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
